Class ClasspathResourceProvider

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.app.ClasspathResourceProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResourceProvider
public class ClasspathResourceProvider extends Object implements ResourceProvider
Default ResourceProvider that resolves resources from the application's classpath using the current class loader.

This implementation attempts to be tolerant of common resource path formats: it first tries the provided name as-is using the class loader, then retries without a leading slash, and finally falls back to Class.getResource which understands leading slashes relative to the classpath root.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ClasspathResourceProvider()
    Create a provider that uses this class's class loader to resolve resources from the runtime classpath.

  • Method Details

    • getResource

      public URL getResource(String resourcePath)
      Resolve a resource path to a URL using multiple strategies.
      1. Try ClassLoader.getResource(String) with the provided name.
      2. If not found, remove a leading '/' and retry.
      3. As a last resort, call Class.getResource(String) on this class which accepts names with a leading '/'.
      Specified by:
      getResource in interface ResourceProvider
      Parameters:
      resourcePath - the classpath resource path to resolve, or null to indicate no resource
      Returns:
      a URL to the resource, or null if not found
